languages.text: "Придержи свой язык, или я сам его укорочу. Мандрагорам не нужны мон-кай — мандрагорам нужен я. Даже если наберутся смелости прийти за мной... о, это будет занятно".

"Mind your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite an amusement to behold."
languages.original_text: "Придержи свой язык, или я сам его укорочу. Мандрагорам не нужны мон-кай — мандрагорам нужен я. Даже если наберутся смелости прийти за мной... о, это будет занятно".

traits.locale_text: "Hold your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite entertaining."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Vous feriez mieux de tenir votre langue si vous ne voulez pas vous la faire arracher. Les Mandragores n'ont que faire des mon-keigh. Les Mandragores me veulent moi. Et même si elles se sont montrées assez intrépides pour venir jusqu'à moi... quelle exquise distraction cela ferait ! »
languages.original_text: "Mind your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite an amusement to behold."

traits.locale_text: « Vous feriez mieux de tenir votre langue si vous ne voulez pas vous la faire arracher. Les mandragores n'ont que faire des mon-keigh. Les mandragores me veulent moi. Et même si elles se sont montrées assez intrépides pour venir jusqu'à moi... quelle exquise distraction cela ferait ! »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “说话当心点，否则我会把你的舌头割下来。那些曼德拉并不在乎猴子，他们想找的人是我。他们胆子还真大，居然敢找我的麻烦……噢，这一定会非常有趣。”
languages.original_text: "Mind your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite an amusement to behold."

traits.locale_text: “说话当心点，否则我会把你的舌头割下来。那些曼德拉并不在乎猴子，他们想找的人是我。他们胆子还真大，居然敢找我的麻烦……噢，这一定会非常有趣。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「言葉には気をつけることだな。マンドレイクはモン＝ケイのことなど気にもとめていない。奴らが狙っているのは俺だ。たとえ奴らが大胆になって俺を襲いに来たとしても…まあ、見ていて楽しい余興にはなるだろうな」
languages.original_text: "Mind your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite an amusement to behold."

traits.locale_text: 「言葉には気をつけることだな。マンドレイクはモン＝ケイのことなど気にもとめていない。奴らが狙っているのは俺だ。たとえ奴らが大胆になって俺を襲いに来たとしても…まあ、見ていて楽しい余興にはなるだろうな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, bevor ich sie Euch abschneide. Den Mandraks sind Chem-Pan-Sey völlig egal. Sie wollen nur mich. Selbst wenn sie den Mut aufbringen, mich anzugreifen ... oh, es wäre das reinste Vergnügen."
languages.original_text: "Mind your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite an amusement to behold."

traits.locale_text: "Hütet Eure Zunge, bevor ich sie Euch abschneide. Den Mandraks sind Chem-Pan-Sey völlig egal. Sie wollen nur mich. Selbst wenn sie den Mut aufbringen, mich anzugreifen ... oh, es wäre das reinste Vergnügen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Contén esa lengua si no quieres que te la corte. A las mandrágoras les traen sin cuidado los mon-keigh. Las mandrágoras me buscan a mí. Aun cuando pudiesen reunir el valor necesario para intentar capturarme... oh, sería un espectáculo de lo más divertido».
languages.original_text: "Mind your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite an amusement to behold."

traits.locale_text: «Contén esa lengua si no quieres que te la corte. A las mandrágoras les traen sin cuidado los mon-keigh. Las mandrágoras me buscan a mí. Aun cuando pudiesen reunir el valor necesario para intentar capturarme... oh, sería un espectáculo de lo más divertido».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Doğru konuş yoksa dilini keseceğim. Kankurutanlar, mon-keighleri önemsemez. Kankurutanlar beni istiyor. Peşime düşecek cesareti bulsalar... Ah be, o günleri görmek ne keyifli olurdu."
languages.original_text: "Mind your tongue before I cut it down for you. The Mandrakes care not about mon-keigh. The Mandrakes want me. Even if they were to grow bold enough to come for me... oh, it would be quite an amusement to behold."

traits.locale_text: "Doğru konuş yoksa dilini keseceğim. Kankurutanlar mon-keighleri önemsemez. Kankurutanlar beni istiyor. Kendilerini peşime düşecek kadar cesur gördülerse bile... Ah, buna şahit olmak çok eğlenceli olurdu."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
